languages.text: "Среди докладов есть странная заметка — на одной из нижних палуб была найдена группа офицеров, убитая вышедшим из-под контроля сервитором. Что они делали в отсеке — доподлинно неизвестно, вероятно, выполняли какой-то искаженный приказ. Смерть наступила в результате множественных переломов и разрывов внутренних органов".

"A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."
languages.original_text: "Среди докладов есть странная заметка — на одной из нижних палуб была найдена группа офицеров, убитая вышедшим из-под контроля сервитором. Что они делали в отсеке — доподлинно неизвестно, вероятно, выполняли какой-то искаженный приказ. Смерть наступила в результате множественных переломов и разрывов внутренних органов".

traits.locale_text: "There is a strange notice among the reports — the guards found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they were doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations of internal organs."

"There is a strange notice among the reports — the guards found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they were doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations of internal organs."

"A note was added to the reports — guards found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

"A note was added to the reports — guards found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

"A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

languages.text: “报告中还提到了一条备注：执法者在底层甲板发现了一名遭到杀害的军官，死因是多处骨折与内脏撕裂，而凶手是一名发生故障的机仆。目前并不清楚那个机仆做了什么，很可能是执行了错误的命令。”
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

traits.locale_text: “报告中还提到了一条备注：镇压者在底层甲板发现了一名遭到杀害的军官，死因是多处骨折与内脏撕裂，而凶手是一名发生故障的奴工。目前并不清楚那个奴工做了什么，很可能是执行了错误的命令。”

languages.text: «Había una nota adjunta a un informe. Seguridad ha encontrado a un grupo de oficiales asesinados por un servidor descontrolado en una de las cubiertas inferiores. No está claro lo que estaba haciendo, posiblemente ejecutar alguna orden falsa. Las muertes han sido causadas por numerosas fracturas y laceraciones de órganos internos».
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

traits.locale_text: «Había una nota adjunta a un informe. Seguridad ha encontrado a un grupo de oficiales asesinados por un servidor descontrolado en una de las cubiertas inferiores. No está claro lo que estaba haciendo, posiblemente ejecutar alguna orden falsa. Las muertes han sido causadas por numerosas fracturas y laceraciones de órganos internos».

languages.text: "Den Berichten wurde eine Notiz hinzugefügt — Enforcer fanden eine Gruppe von Offizieren, die von einem abtrünnigen Diener auf einem der unteren Decks getötet wurden. Es ist nicht klar, was sie getan haben, wahrscheinlich haben sie einen falschen Befehl ausgeführt. Die Todesfälle wurden durch mehrfache Frakturen und Verletzungen der inneren Organe verursacht."
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

traits.locale_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

languages.text: « Une note a été ajoutée aux rapports... Les prévôts ont découvert un groupe d'officiers tués par un servitor détraqué sur l'un des ponts inférieurs. Ce qu'ils y faisaient n'a pas été clairement établi, mais nous pensons qu'ils obéissaient à l'un des faux ordres. Leur mort a été provoquée par de multiples fractures et par la lacération de leurs organes internes. »
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

traits.locale_text: « Une note a été ajoutée aux rapports... Les prévôts ont découvert un groupe d'officiers tués par un servitor détraqué sur l'un des ponts inférieurs. Ce qu'ils y faisaient n'a pas été clairement établi, mais nous pensons qu'ils obéissaient à l'un des faux ordres. Leur mort a été provoquée par de multiples fractures et par la lacération de leurs organes internes. »

languages.text: 「報告にメモが追加されました。エンフォーサー達はとある下層デッキで、不良サーヴィターに殺害された士官の集団を発見しました。何をしたかはハッキリしませんが、おそらく誤った命令を実行したものと思われます。何箇所も骨折して、内臓を裂いて傷になったことが死因です」
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."

traits.locale_text: 「報告にメモが追加されました。エンフォーサー達はとある下層デッキで、不良サーヴィターに殺害された士官の集団を発見しました。何をしたかはハッキリしませんが、おそらく誤った命令を実行したものと思われます。何箇所も骨折して、内臓を裂いて傷になったことが死因です」

languages.text: "Raporlara bir not eklenmiş. İnfazcılar, alt güvertelerin birinde kontrol dışı bir hizmetör tarafından öldürülen bir grup subaya denk gelmiş. Ne yaptıkları net değil, büyük ihtimalle yanlış bir emre uymaya çalışıyorlarmış. Ölüm sebepleri, iç organlarında meydana gelen çok sayıda çatlak ve yarık."
languages.original_text: "A note was added to the reports — enforcers found a group of officers killed by a rogue servitor on one of the lower decks. It is not clear what they had been doing, most likely carrying out a false order. The deaths were caused by multiple fractures and lacerations to internal organs."
